channel.title: How to change starting outfit HELP! IM NEWB
channel.description: I need help changing starting outfit. and changing area. thnx alot im a noob!

item.title: How to change starting outfit HELP! IM NEWB
item.dc:creator: @PkScape PkScape
item.description:
@PkScape wrote:

to change starting area go to player.java and search for

heightLevel = #[/code](THE '#' NEEDS TO BE A NUMBER SO SEARCH FOR[code]heightLevel = 0

After u find change the 0 to a different number…

congratulations youve changed the starting area!!!

~ PkScape ~

Hope this helped…

Read full topic
item.source: How to change starting outfit HELP! IM NEWB

item.title: How to change starting outfit HELP! IM NEWB
item.dc:creator: @elitebrute elitebrute
item.description:
@elitebrute wrote:

[quote=“Jerich0, post:4, topic:189929”]Search something like this:
Change the id’s to your items

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=6656; playerEquipment[playerCape]=14125; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1704; playerEquipment[playerChest]=6654; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=6658; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=2460;[/quote]

thnx alot! ! =] and could u help me to change area, or is it the code right below all that stuff?

Read full topic
